about_the_game:
ATT: A Twitch account is REQUIRED to play Retro Coin Pusher World

Retro Coin Pusher World DLC is a chat interactive game, designed around an old arcade coin pusher machine.

Created for streamers to enjoy with their viewers and friends on twitch!

The thrill of coin dropping with only a few keystrokes. Enjoy the ultimate retro coin pusher experience, like ones found at amusement parks, arcades, carnivals, circus, and more. Be precise in your drops! Grab prizes, toys, trigger mini games and much more fun!

No Coin Skins or Emote use from other DLC's or base game will work on this DLC.

Timing the coin drop is the key in Retro Coin Pusher World.

Alot of the game is custamiseable vie pressing ESC when you have the game open. This is also where you would connect to twitch aswell.
detailed_description:
ATT: A Twitch account is REQUIRED to play Retro Coin Pusher World

Retro Coin Pusher World DLC is a chat interactive game, designed around an old arcade coin pusher machine.

Created for streamers to enjoy with their viewers and friends on twitch!

The thrill of coin dropping with only a few keystrokes. Enjoy the ultimate retro coin pusher experience, like ones found at amusement parks, arcades, carnivals, circus, and more. Be precise in your drops! Grab prizes, toys, trigger mini games and much more fun!

No Coin Skins or Emote use from other DLC's or base game will work on this DLC.

Timing the coin drop is the key in Retro Coin Pusher World.

Alot of the game is custamiseable vie pressing ESC when you have the game open. This is also where you would connect to twitch aswell.
legal_notice: This game is Twitch Intergrated and there for if you fail to understand that you can only play this via installing the game and connecting it to twitch and visit the website then we wave the rights to refund you
name: Retro Coin Pusher World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (32/64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: All Spec's are tested and work fine without any issues
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (32/64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: All Spec's are tested and work fine without any issues
